sentences.en: Considering his habitual stinginess, we were surprised when he donated money to charity.
sentences.cn: 他平时很吝啬,所以当他捐钱行善时, 我们都感到吃惊.

sentences.en: Generosity leads to a rich life. Stinginess leads to a poor life.
sentences.cn: 懂得付出,不计较吃亏,才是富有的人生; 锱铢必较,只知道接受,必是贫穷的人生.

sentences.en: Her stinginess is part and parcel of her nature.
His stinginess with money is known among all of us.
sentences.cn: 我们都知道他在钱上很吝啬.

sentences.en: It is superficial to act generously without being free from stinginess.
sentences.cn: 不能免于悭啬,却做布施之行,是为表面.

sentences.en: Make offerings to go against stinginess.
Such stinginess came from my side of the family.
sentences.cn: 这种吝啬是我这边的祖先遗传下来的.

sentences.en: We must not equate thrift with stinginess.
sentences.cn: 我们不能把勤俭和吝啬等同起来.

words.tran_cn: 吝啬的，小气的；有刺的；缺乏的
